title: Mmr confirmed went down.
body:
So i was originally getting 25 lp a win when i was in b5, made it to b4, was getting 12 lp a win, carried myself to b3 promos 3 times at 12 lp a win so its safe to say i won a good 30 or so games with minimal losses.

lost 2 games at ridiculous lp per loss with two 10lp dodges (something like 25 or something so 70 lp loss all up enough to drop me to 0) got demoted won my first game since being back in b5, 17lp.

Excuse me? you mean to tell me that my mmr has dropped so low that is lost 8lp gain?

While winning much more than I lost?

What is this, Russia?

replies.body:
Mmr went up by losing games.

This is definitely russia.

What we have learned today is that the mmr system is so innacurate that it can swing between 17 and 25lp gains in a matter of 2-3 wins or losses and it does it in reverse with losses resulting in more lp gain and wins resulting in less lp gain.

Fix your shit rito.

Fuck you're frustrating. You have such a black and white view on everything. 
A) LP gains or losses also take into account the skill level of your oponents. How are you gonna sit there and tell us you know the Mmr of your oponents as well? Just fucking accept your Mmr for whatever it is. Win more games. Like, seriously... You still have  47% win rate. Why the fuck would your elo climb with 47 fucking percent win rate. 
B) fucking teamwork is skill. I've watched some of your games over this year. You literally play like you speak. One man Rambo. And it's God awful to watch. Talk up your 1v1 game all you want BUT IT'S NOT A 1V1 FUCKING GAME.  Go learn how to be part of a team. Go join the military or something. Fuck. 
C) I keep repeating this to you. DIE LESS!!!

Ill play as a team when i have a team to play with.

This is bronze NO ONE is reliable.

Everyone is your enemy.

its 1v9 and you cant fucking rely on anyone to not fuck up.

if replays exist look up any game with me supporting elemnophee.

I know how to work as a team, but only when my team isnt a retarded piece of shit (hence why i said the elemnophee games, thats my boi)

Also fatty, unless the Matchmaking system is stupidly inaccurate and is just giving my a wild swing of +-10lp gains worth of mmr differential between the teams theres no reason to attribute my lp gains/losses to skill differential.

And if that is the case that still means riot has an issue to fix.

There is no scenario where i should ever gain less lp for winning 30 games in a fucking row, and gain more lp for losing 4 in a row.

The key thing you need to get through that thick fucking skull of yours if you havnt figured it out yourself yet.

Is that i know how to work as a team.

I choose not to, because working as a decent teammate in bronze has gotten me killed far more times than its worked out well.

I see team mate having trouble, go in and peel.

Oh look said team mate bolted and left me to die, i shouldve let them fucking die and be a shitty team mate.

Atleast then someone who isnt useless would be alive.

And its just shit like that all the fucking time.

People can fucking tell me to play as a team all they fucking wont, it wont help shit because you cant teamwork your way out of some extra chromosomes.

Like fuck the shit that i see people do in these games the only reason im not perma banned for screaming profanities is because i air this shit with my actual voice.

God knows id be perma banned 50 times over if i told my teams just how retarded i think they are for fucking diving that 20 kill trynd with zilean ult in baron pit.

Yes

ive seen that happen.

Yes i did nearly fucking flip my table.

Not because we lost the game off that play,

But because fucking retards piss me off to a degree you cant even understand.

Youve seen those edgy memes where people think warning labels shouldnt be a thing so that cunts that cant problem solve for shit and lack the ability of critical thinking would die of?

I LIVE THOSE MEMES.

I see someone who cant use fucking critical thinking and i see literal fucking trash.

And my god, alot of bronze cant critically think for fucking shit, all they think is "hurrr itd be so cool and fucking anime if i just went in and 1v5'd here"

Like fuck i do the same thing, but you know the fucking difference, i do it when A im pissed the fuck off from other people doing it.

OR B im fucking Well ahead and dont give two shits the games over anyway.

Well look, if you're unwilling to improve, then you will not improve. 

Obviously something isn't working. 

The system works for me. The system works for a lot of people. The only factor in every single one of your games, is you. 

Honestly, I REALLY think that you should take some time to consider your idea of team play. It's not just jumping into a fight when your team mate gets caught out.

And again. Stop dying so much. Not worth chasing that last kill if you die in the process

Hold up a minute. In ranked, you've done triple ROA support. You've done thorn mail to zzrot rush Taric. You've played mord support. You've played kennen support. You haven't built sight stone once in the last 20 games with several support games. Heimerdinger support? Like, are you for real? I see now where your problem lies.
just get in a 5 man premade and get the whole team to camp botlane for the first 20 minutes of the game, seems to be the bronze meta atm. you will have your mmr up in no time
In Soviet Russia, MMR climbs you.
